author: Graham Dyson
description: Analyzes JavaScript on the file system, processes the analysis and renders the processed analysis to an SVG.
name: eunice

scripts.all: npm run spellcheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run dogfooding && npm run harness
scripts.build: npm run build-prepare && npx webpack -p --config webpack.config.js && rm dist/bin.js.map
scripts.build-development: npm run build-prepare && npx webpack -d --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build-prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r node_modules/@devsnicket/eunice-renderer-test-harness/dist/harness dist && rm dist/harness/harness.js.map
scripts.dogfooding: (cd dogfooding && rm -rf output && mkdir output && cd .. && node bin --accept-license --directory-to-create-or-add-to-stacks-from=dogfooding --include-service-workers=true --include-source-map=true --ignore-path-pattern="(^|/)(\..*|dist|gh-pages|node_modules|output|test-cases|test-coverage)$" --modify-stacks-file=dogfooding/modify-file-stacks.yaml --modify-stacks-key=type --modify-stacks-pattern=^file$ --output-base-file-name=index --output-directory-path=dogfooding/output --output-svg --output-yaml --package-names=call-with-process-standard-streams --package-names=dependency-and-structure --package-names=javascript-analyzer --package-names=processors --package-names=renderer --package-names=renderer-test-harness --package-names=run-tests-from-file-system --package-names=test-harnesses --package-names=test-harnesses-processor-plugins --package-prefix=eunice- --package-scope=devsnicket --directories=. --root-item-identifiers=javascript)
scripts.harness: (cd harness && rm -rf output && mkdir output && npx webpack -p --config webpack.config.js)
